articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Chaim Topol: the Fiddler on the Roof star showed Jews their origin story - The Guardian
articles.description: The actor who played Tevye in the 1971 film brought the struggles of a generation to life and helped the children of Jewish immigrants understand their heritage
articles.content: Every now and then a celebrity passes away and it feels like a death in the family. For me, and many other Jews, the passing of Chaim Topol is one such occasion. Renowned for his portrayal of Tevye, … [+4433 chars]

articles.title: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas enjoy 'daddy and mommy's night out' at South Asian Excellence bash - Daily Mail
